text: Koni Yesu yi e miriyaan kolon, a yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “Yamanan naxan yitaxunxi yɛngɛni, na yamanan kalama nɛn mafurɛn!11.17 yamanana: Ɲinanne nun yinnane Setana sɛnbɛn bun alo yamanan nun a mangan kii naxan yi. Seen naxanye Setana sɛnbɛn bun, xa ne e bode kedi, na luxi nɛn alo yamanan na yitaxun. Nayi, Setana mi ɲinanne kedɛ alo muxuni itoe a falama Yesu ma kii naxan yi. Yɛngɛn tanden naxan kui, na fan kalama nɛn.
